titleStmt.title: An epistle of the p[ro]phete Hieremie
Bible. O.T. Baruch. English. Selections.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Redman for Roberte Redman],

notesStmt.note: Taken out of the sixth chapter of Baruch.
Place of publication and printer from colophon; suggested publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
